body: üíÅüèª **Automating gr2m/helpdesk: Creating tests for actions for faster iteration II** üìÖ Thursday, August 26, 2021 üïê 10:00am Pacific Time üéôÔ∏è _no guests_ üìç https://www.twitch.tv/gregorcodes üè∑Ô∏è testing --- Subscribe to this issues to get a notification before the show begins and a summary after the show concludes. ### Creating tests for actions for faster iteration Part II Part two of https://github.com/gr2m/helpdesk/issues/46. I will continue adding tests for the existing scripts #### Outline - [x] Recap the first episode: https://github.com/gr2m/helpdesk/issues/46 (`npm test`, running tests as CI on GitHub Actions) - [x] Add tests to `handle-show-announcement.js` - [ ] Add tests to `handle-show-done.js` - [ ] Add tests to `handle-show-start.js` - [ ] Add tests to `update-show-sections-in-readmes.js` - [ ] Add tests to `update-twitter-account.js` #### TODOs Before the show - [x] 30 minute announcement tweet (https://twitter.com/gr2m/status/1430932120420114432) - [x] 30 minute announcement comment (https://github.com/gr2m/helpdesk/issues/47#issuecomment-906567048) When show begins - [x] start of show tweet (https://twitter.com/gr2m/status/1430939403883483137) - [x] comment on issue (https://github.com/gr2m/helpdesk/issues/47#issuecomment-906586725) - [x] Set twitter profile url (https://twitter.com/gr2m) After the show - [x] Reset twitter profile after the show (https://twitter.com/gr2m) - [ ] recording available tweet #### Recording _will be added after the show_ #### Shownotes - We added a test for `handle-show-announcement.js` via https://github.com/gr2m/helpdesk/commit/2bd2bbf859c753c19a8abaae7cfa8fdbea0c0f5d - We had to cut this episode short, sorry
